title: Jennifer Hudson | Trick Or Tweet?
description:
Use of hate speech spiked on Twitter following Elon Musk’s takeover, President Obama is setting hearts aflutter on the campaign trail, and Brazil’s presidential election is finally over. And EGOT winner Jennifer Hudson is used to appearing on television as an actress and a singer, but her new job as host of a daytime talk show is exposing her to all sorts of new production terms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS
